Name: The Amazing Race Canada
Title: When Am I Going to See My Dog Next?
Desc: Tensions are high during a Face Off as teams sweep into a Switch Back in Trois-Rivières, Que.
LongDescription: Tensions are high during a Face Off as teams sweep into a Switch Back in Trois-Rivières, Que.; the detour leaves some tongue tied, while others get into a paper jam; at the roadblock teams struggle to hold their horses.
